mission.posting: One of the largest corporations in the world will play a huge part in our plans for the future. We need admin access to their system.

email.subject: Danton Enterprises
email.body:
Danton Enterprises is at the forefront of cyber security. They have a part in something big that will happen in the future. We need admin access to their company's server, as it will hold the key to our plans. Infiltrate their servers, find the admin pass and report back with the password.
-L
